title: values printed nested for loops- describe behavior

content.question: Which of the following best describes the behavior of the code segment?

choices.label: It prints  "*"  a total of  outerMax + innerMax  times.
It prints  "*"  a total of  outerMax * innerMax  times.
It prints  "*"  a total of  (outerMax + 1) + (innerMax + 1)  times.
It prints  "*"  a total of  (outerMax + 1) * (innerMax + 1)  times.

content.answer: It prints  "*"  a total of  outerMax * innerMax  times.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
